00011 CSoundChannel::CSoundChannel(SDL_AudioSpec AudioSpec) :
00012 m_AudioSpec(AudioSpec)
00013 {
00014  m_freq_corr = 0; // used for correcting PC-Speaker sampling for different frequencies
00015  m_sound_ptr = 0;
00016  m_sound_timer = 0;
00017  m_sound_playing = false;
00018  m_waveState = 0;
00019  m_hq = false;
00020  m_sound_paused = true;
00021  m_sound_forced = false;
00022  m_pSoundSlot = NULL;
00023  
00024  m_desiredfreq = 0;      // current desired frequency in hz
00025  m_changerate = 0;       // frequency in samples (calculated)
00026  m_freqtimer = 0;        // time when to change waveform state
00027  m_waveState = 0;        // current position of the output waveform
00028  m_balance = 0;
00029  
00030  setFormat(AudioSpec.format);
00031  setFrequencyCorrection(AudioSpec.freq);
00032 }

00034 CSoundChannel::~CSoundChannel() {
00035 }

00037 void CSoundChannel::setFrequencyCorrection(int freq)
00038 {
00039  switch (freq)
00040  {
00041   case 48000: m_freq_corr = 16; break;
00042   case 44100: m_freq_corr = 15; break;
00043   case 22050: m_freq_corr = 14; break;
00044   case 11025: m_freq_corr = 12; break;
00045   default: m_freq_corr = 0; break;
00046  }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CSoundChannel::stopSound(void)
00050 {
00051     m_sound_ptr = 0;
00052     m_sound_timer = 0;
00053     m_sound_playing = false;
00054     m_waveState = m_wavein;
00055     m_freqtimer = 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void CSoundChannel::setFormat( Uint16 format )
00059 {
00060  m_AudioSpec.format = format;
00061  switch( m_AudioSpec.format )
00062  {
00063   case AUDIO_U8:
00064    m_volume = WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8;
00065    m_waveout = WAVE_OUT_U8;
00066    m_wavein = WAVE_IN_U8;
00067    break;
00068   case AUDIO_S8:
00069    m_volume = WAVEFORM_VOLUME_8;
00070    m_waveout = WAVE_OUT_S8;
00071    m_wavein = WAVE_IN_S8;
00072    break;
00073   case AUDIO_U16:
00074    m_volume = WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16;
00075    m_waveout = WAVE_OUT_U16;
00076    m_wavein = WAVE_IN_U16;
00077    break;
00078   case AUDIO_S16:
00079    m_volume = WAVEFORM_VOLUME_16;
00080    m_waveout = WAVE_OUT_S16;
00081    m_wavein = WAVE_IN_S16;
00082    break;
00083  }
00084 
00085  m_waveState = m_wavein;
00086 }

00089 void CSoundChannel::setupSound(GameSound current_sound,
00090           unsigned int sound_timer,
00091           bool playing,
00092           unsigned int freqtimer,
00093           bool sound_forced,
00094           Uint16 format)
00095 {
00096  setFormat( format );
00097  m_current_sound = current_sound;
00098  m_sound_timer = sound_timer;
00099  m_sound_playing = playing;
00100  m_sound_ptr = 0;
00101  m_waveState = m_wavein;
00102  m_freqtimer = freqtimer;
00103  m_sound_forced = sound_forced;
00104 }

00106 // generates len bytes of waveform for the channel.
00107 template <typename T>
00108 void CSoundChannel::generateWaveform(T *waveform, unsigned int len, int frequency, bool stereo )
00109 { 
00110  len /= sizeof(T); 
00111  std::vector<T> WaveBuffer(len);
00112  
00113  unsigned int halffreq = (frequency>>1);
00114  
00115  int waittime = // How much do we divide wait time for change?
00116  (m_freq_corr == 16) ?
00117   (frequency / SLOW_RATE)
00118  :
00119   (((m_freq_corr*frequency)>>4) / SLOW_RATE);
00120  
00121  // setup so we process a new byte of the sound first time through
00122  bool firsttime = true;
00123  
00124  CSoundSlot& currentSound = (*m_pSoundSlot)[m_current_sound];
00125  
00126  for(unsigned int index=0 ; index<len ; index++)
00127  {
00128   if (!m_sound_timer || firsttime)
00129   {
00130    // get new frequency and compute how fast we have to
00131    // change the wave data
00132    if(m_sound_ptr < currentSound.getSoundlength())
00133     m_desiredfreq = currentSound.getSoundData()[m_sound_ptr];
00134    else
00135     m_desiredfreq = 0xffff;
00136    
00137    if (m_desiredfreq==0xffff)
00138    {  // end of sound...fill rest of buffer with silence
00139     for(;index<len;index++)
00140     {
00141      WaveBuffer[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence;
00142     }
00143     m_sound_playing = false;
00144     
00145     memcpy(waveform, &WaveBuffer[0],len*sizeof(T));
00146     
00147     m_sound_ptr = 0;
00148     
00149     return;
00150    }
00151    else if (m_desiredfreq == 0x0000)
00152    {
00153     m_waveState = m_waveout;
00154    }
00155    else
00156    {  // compute change rate
00157     m_changerate = (halffreq / m_desiredfreq);
00158    }
00159    
00160    m_sound_ptr++;
00161    if (!firsttime) m_sound_timer = waittime;
00162    firsttime = 0;
00163   }
00164   
00165   if (m_sound_timer) m_sound_timer--;
00166   
00167   if (m_desiredfreq==0x0000)
00168   {   // silence
00169    WaveBuffer[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence;
00170   }
00171   else
00172   {
00173    // time to change waveform state?
00174    if (m_freqtimer > m_changerate)
00175    {  // toggle waveform, generating a square wave
00176     int i=0;
00177     
00178     if(m_sound_ptr > 0)
00179      i=m_volume;
00180     
00181     if (m_waveState == m_AudioSpec.silence-i)
00182      m_waveState = m_AudioSpec.silence+i;
00183     else
00184      m_waveState = m_AudioSpec.silence-i;
00185     
00186     m_freqtimer = 0;
00187    }
00188    else m_freqtimer++;
00189    
00190    // put wave data into buffer
00191    WaveBuffer[index] = m_waveState;
00192   }
00193   
00194   if(stereo) // Primitive stereo transformation
00195   {
00196    if(index < len)
00197    {
00198     index++;
00199     WaveBuffer[index] = m_waveState;
00200    }
00201   }
00202  }
00203  memcpy(waveform, &WaveBuffer[0],len*sizeof(T));
00204 }
00205 
00206 // This program reads the balance information and balances the stereo sound
00207 void CSoundChannel::transintoStereoChannels(Uint8* waveform, unsigned int len)
00208 {
00209  if(m_balance != 0) // Because, if it is not zero, there is no balance, and waves must be adapted
00210  {
00211   // -127 is only for the left speaker, while 127 is for the right speaker. 0 Is center
00212   
00213   unsigned int index;
00214   float f_value; // Needed for better calculation of mixing the stereo channels
00215   
00216   if(m_hq)
00217   {
00218    // balance the left channel.
00219    for( index = 0 ; index < len-1 ; index += 2 )
00220    {
00221     // balance here!
00222     f_value = (127 - (m_balance)) * ( waveform[index] - m_AudioSpec.silence );
00223     f_value /= 127 ;
00224     if(m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value < 255)
00225      waveform[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value;
00226    }
00227    
00228    // balance the right channel.
00229    for( index = 1 ; index < len; index += 2 )
00230    {
00231     // balance here!
00232     f_value = (127 + (m_balance)) * ( waveform[index] - m_AudioSpec.silence );
00233     f_value /= 127 ;
00234     if(m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value < 255)
00235      waveform[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value;
00236    }
00237   }
00238   else
00239   {
00240    // balance the left channel.
00241    for( index = 0 ; index < len-1 ; index += 2 )
00242    {
00243     // balance here!
00244     f_value = ( (127 - (m_balance)) * ( waveform[index] - m_AudioSpec.silence ) ) / 127 ;
00245     waveform[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value;
00246    }
00247    
00248    // balance the right channel.
00249    for( index = 1 ; index < len; index += 2 )
00250    {
00251     // balance here!
00252     f_value = ( (127 + (m_balance)) * ( waveform[index] - m_AudioSpec.silence ) ) / 127 ;
00253     waveform[index] = m_AudioSpec.silence + f_value;
00254    }
00255   }
00256  }
00257 }
00258 
00259 void CSoundChannel::readWaveform(Uint8* waveform, int len, Uint8 channels, int frequency)
00260 {
00261     if (m_sound_playing)
00262     {
00263      if(!m_hq) // There is no HQ sound in the buffer
00264       {
00265    if ( m_AudioSpec.format == AUDIO_U16 || m_AudioSpec.format == AUDIO_S16 )
00266    {
00267     generateWaveform( (Sint16*) waveform, len, frequency, (channels==2) ? true : false );
00268    }
00269    else
00270    {
00271     generateWaveform( (Uint8*) waveform, len, frequency, (channels==2) ? true : false );
00272    }
00273       }
00274       else
00275       {
00276        stHQSound& hqsound = *(*m_pSoundSlot)[m_current_sound].getHQSoundPtr();
00277 
00278           if ((m_sound_ptr + (Uint32)len) >= hqsound.sound_len)
00279           {
00280            // Fill the rest with silence
00281            memset(waveform, m_AudioSpec.silence, len );
00282 
00283            m_sound_ptr = 0;
00284            m_sound_playing = false;
00285           }
00286           else
00287           {
00288            memcpy(waveform, hqsound.sound_buffer + m_sound_ptr, len);
00289               m_sound_ptr += len;
00290           }
00291       }
00292   
00293      if(channels == 2 && m_AudioSpec.format == AUDIO_U8)
00294   {
00295    transintoStereoChannels(waveform, len);
00296   }
00297     }
00298  else
00299   memset(waveform, m_AudioSpec.silence, len);
00300 }
